creator: dahlstrom+apache@googlers.com
text:
Created attachment 33534
patch containing proposed one-line fix, and test for same

This leaves useful information missing from the output of XMLJUnitResultFormatter, for example.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Thanks a lot Dana!

I've applied your patch, will be part of 1.9.8 and 1.10.0.
